NEW_OPAL_ADMIN.HOST: <[String] Host address of the new opalAdmin implemented in Django (e.g., http://host.docker.internal:8000)>
NEW_OPAL_ADMIN.AUTH_TOKEN: <[String] Authorization token for accessing the endpoints. See 'Authentication' section in the new opalAdmin documentation>

SSL.CERTIFICATE_FILE: Path to the server's SSL certificate file, such as client.crt
SSL.CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITY_FILE: Path to the server's SSL certificate authority file, such as ca.cert.pem

QUESTIONNAIRE_COMPLETED_PATH: Path notified when a questionnaire is completed
